description: AEM-2 was a NASA/LaRC mission (also referred to as `SAGE', `Explorer 60' or AEM-B) with the objective to monitor stratospheric aerosol and ozone and its influence on the climate (study of aerosol sources and sinks, aerosol transport, aerosol radiative and climatological implications, etc.).
name: Stratospheric Aerosol and Gas Experiment Applications Explorer Mission 2
